attributes.action: Sack Roy Hodgson as England Manager
attributes.additional_details: England fans have taken time to support their team all over the world and those who have gone to great expense to follow their team all around the world, for many fans going to France to support them was a once in life time chance, Roy Hodgson's attitude to that was to field a completely inept team that was unable to capitalise on a great opportunity to finish top of the group and have simple route into the quarters we are now facing an uphill climb and now face heart break in the round of 16
attributes.background: During the World Cup 2014, He was forgiven but countless England fans world wide have had to watch as he makes school Boy errors and does not seem to learn from them, during the Euro 2016 campaign his team selections against Slovakia and his sub's against Russia are just incompetent
